perspectives.label: Clean_Architecture
perspectives.description: Enforces a standard 3-tier layered architecture (Presentation -> Business -> Data)

groups.label: Presentation
groups.description: Handles HTTP requests and UI interaction

groups.label: Business
groups.description: Contains business logic and service orchestration

groups.label: Common
groups.description: Shared utilities and DTOs accessible by all layers

constraints.message: Violation: The Presentation layer (Controllers) must not access the Data layer (Repositories) directly. Please use the Business/Service layer.
Violation: The Data layer should strictly focus on persistence and not depend on Business logic.
Violation: Business logic must not depend on the Presentation layer (Controllers).
Violation: The Data layer must not depend on the Presentation layer.
Critical: Main application code must never import or depend on Test code.
